name: Mysterious Valley
description:
As you are thrusted into a mysterious valley, collect 5 magical gems to open the door leading to the unknown! Do it by beating multiple puzzles that both require skills in platforming but also problem solving.

WARNING: On Webgl version for cursor(dot in the middle of your screen) to work correctly you need to have your mouse cursor in the middle of game window. This is due to weirdness of cursor and unity webgl version. Sorry for this weirdness.
